content: The question is: Find the the 20th number in the Fibonacci sequence.
title: Fibonacci sequence

content:
The question is: given an integer, find the k-th digit from the right.
For example:
Given number k Result 123216234 4 6 2351234 7 2 7 2 0
title: Find k-th digit from right

content: The question is: from 1 to 10,000, calculate the difference between the sum of all multiples of 3 and all multiples of 4.
title: Calculate difference between two sums

content:
The question is to print all integers between 1 and 100, including 1 and 100. There are also some variations:
Can you print out all of them in an ascending way? How about descending? Can you print out in a random way? Have fun!
title: Print all integers in [1, 100]
